sections.heading: Definitions
sections.text: 326.002 Definitions.—As used in ss. 326.001-326.006, the term:

sections.heading: 326.001-326.006 may be cited as the “Yacht and Ship Brokers’ Act.”
sections.text: 326.001-326.006 may be cited as the “Yacht and Ship Brokers’ Act.”

sections.heading: As used in ss. 326.001-326.006, the term:(1)“Broker” means a person who, for or in expectation of compensation: sells, offers, or negotiates to sell; buys, offers, or negotiates to buy; solicits or obtains listings of; or negotiates the purchase, sale, or exchange of, yachts for other persons
The division shall:(1)Administer ss
sections.text: 326.001-326.006 and collect fees sufficient to administer ss. 326.001-326.006.(2)Adopt rules pursuant to ss. 120.536(1) and 120.54 to implement ss. 326.001-326.006 and to classify brokers and salespersons and regulate their activities.(3)Enforce the provisions of

sections.heading: (1)A person may not act as a broker or salesperson unless licensed under the Yacht and Ship Brokers’ Act
sections.text: The division shall adopt rules establishing a procedure for the biennial renewal of licenses.(2)A broker may not engage in business as a broker under a fictitious name unless his or her license
